## Prediction Process by price ~ Date

```{r}
data(file)
y <-file$Per_Gallon_Price; 
x <- file$observation_date;
n <- length(y) 
naa<-length(x)
n

naa
fit <- lm(y ~ x)

e <-resid(fit)

yhat <- predict(fit)




plot(x, e, xlab = "Date", ylab = "Oil Prices($)"
     , bg = "lightblue",
     col = "black", cex =2, pch =21, frame = FALSE)
abline(h =0, lwd =2)

for (i in 1: n)
    lines(c(x[i], x[i]), c(e[i], 0), col = "red", lwd = 1)

```
